svg.aria-label: Passenger cars - sales in selected countries worldwide 2005 to 2018, accessible chart

text.tspan: Passenger cars sales in selected countries worldwide 2005 to 2018
This line chart compares the numbers of passenger car sales in different nations over time from 2005 to 2018.
The 4 lines show the numbers of passenger car sales in
All the lines except China cluster together
U.S., Japan, and Germany track each other across the whole chart.
China starts as the third highest line,
and ends as the highest line.
